snippet: Mr. Pugh, on trial in Brooklyn, was convicted of seeking to support a foreign terrorist organization after trying to travel to Syria.
abstract: Federal jury convicts former United States serviceman Tairod Pugh of attempting to join Islamic State, first case of its kind to reach verdict in courtroom in US; top charge against Pugh is attempted support of terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pugh, on trial in Brooklyn, was convicted of seeking to support a foreign terrorist organization after trying to travel to Syria.

headline.main: Tairod Pugh, Ex-U.S. Serviceman, Is Found Guilty of Trying to Aid ISIS
headline.print_headline: Ex-Serviceman Is Found Guilty of Trying to Aid Islamic State

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
